overview: Grampa Munster hosts a collection of 8 cartoon shorts in another halloween "Spook-tac-ular".  1. "I Don't Scare" (1956)  2. "The Friendly Ghost" (1935)  3. "Magic Mummy" (1933)  4. "The Raven" (1942)  5. "Gypped In Egypt" (1930)  6. "Is My Palm Read?" (1933)
title: Grampa's More Silly Scaries
